name: spacex-api-performance-tests
description: Testes de performance da API SpaceX usando K6

scripts.test:all: npm run test:simple && npm run test:load && npm run test:stress && npm run test:spike
scripts.test:all:dashboard: k6-dashboard.exe run --out web-dashboard scenarios/simple-test.js && k6-dashboard.exe run --out web-dashboard scenarios/load-test.js && k6-dashboard.exe run --out web-dashboard scenarios/stress-test.js && k6-dashboard.exe run --out web-dashboard scenarios/spike-test.js
